text.name: system_description
text.text: Adult games encompass a vast range of activities, from party games to complex video games and role-playing. They can provide mental stimulation, stress relief, and opportunities for social connection. For adults, playing is an essential way to express creativity, build relationships, and engage in satisfying leisure.

text.name: system_description
text.text: Los juegos para adultos abarcan una amplia gama de actividades, desde juegos de fiesta hasta videojuegos complejos y juegos de rol. Para los adultos, jugar es una forma esencial de expresar su creatividad, forjar relaciones y disfrutar de un tiempo libre satisfactorio.

text.text: Os jogos para adultos abrangem uma vasta gama de atividades, desde jogos de festa a videogames complexos e RPGs.
